attributes.action: Topping up earnings when going back to work.
attributes.additional_details:
People on benefits will sometimes find it hard to get back to work earning what they would on benefits, once they go back to work they know that they may end up not being able to afford their rent, bills, council tax, food, etc. so they stay on benefits as they know these things will be covered.

I suggest topping up earnings of those who are on benefits so they can go back to work knowing that they will still be recieving the same amount of money.
